name: Homemade Scotch Eggs
author: UKLAINE
summary: Boiled eggs wrapped with a seasoned sausage meat.  A meal that goes over great at a party or with a salad for a light dinner.
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together the pork sausage and Worcestershire sauce
Combine the flour, salt and pepper; mix into the sausage
Divide the sausage into four equal parts
Mold each part around one of the hard-cooked eggs, rolling between your hands to shape
Place the beaten egg and bread crumbs into separate dishes
Dip the balls into the egg, then roll in the bread crumbs until coated
Heat the oil in a large saucepan or deep fryer to 365 degrees F (180 degrees C), or until a cube of bread dropped into the oil turns brown in 1 minute
Lower the eggs carefully into the hot oil
Fry for 5 minutes, or until deep golden brown
